attributes.action: Make all companies who charge for access to their facilities to stop charging children 12-16 years old as adults as under the law of the land they are children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to stop this age abuse of 12-16 year olds from companies who feel they are above the law of the land which categorises children in these age groups for what they are children.We need to make it illegal for any company to charge anyone under 16 adult prices for any facilities used by them, ie, travel,leisure as these are excessive drains on their parents who have to deal with this dispicable robbery of juveniles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
